Field.Heading: Event Id
Field.Help: Specify an event id to search for. Check sylog events on the Unit Type page to create such event ids.

Field.Heading: Facility
Field.Help: A facility is the syslog-emitting enttity, it could be a device or server.

Field.Heading: Facility Version
Field.Help:
A facility version is the version of the syslog-emitting entity, it could be a device or server. The syntax:
word matches messages which contain 'word'
* matches 0 or more characters
_ matches 1 character
^ if used at beginning (allowed after !) of expression, matches expression only from start of message
$ if used at end of expression, matches expression only at end of message
! if used at beginning of expression, will negate the matching
| split the search, so 'A|B' translates to 'A OR B', and '!A|B' translates to 'NOT A AND NOT B'

Field.Heading: Severity
Field.Help: The severity of a message, going fra EMERGENCY to DEBUG. There should not be anything more severe than ERROR coming from the device.

Field.Heading: User id
Field.Help:
The user id involved in running the server/facility/device The syntax:
word matches messages which contain 'word'
* matches 0 or more characters
_ matches 1 character
^ if used at beginning (allowed after !) of expression, matches expression only from start of message
$ if used at end of expression, matches expression only at end of message
! if used at beginning of expression, will negate the matching
| split the search, so 'A|B' translates to 'A OR B', and '!A|B' translates to 'NOT A AND NOT B'

Field.Heading: IP Address
Field.Help:
The public IP address of the facility. The syntax:
word matches messages which contain 'word'
* matches 0 or more characters
_ matches 1 character
^ if used at beginning (allowed after !) of expression, matches expression only from start of message
$ if used at end of expression, matches expression only at end of message
! if used at beginning of expression, will negate the matching
| split the search, so 'A|B' translates to 'A OR B', and '!A|B' translates to 'NOT A AND NOT B'

Field.Heading: Message
Field.Help:
An expression used to match against the syslog message. If no units in the group have sent messages that matches this expression within the timeout period, then the heartbeat is considered "missing" and a syslog message will be generated. The syntax:
word matches messages which contain 'word'
* matches 0 or more characters
_ matches 1 character
^ if used at beginning (allowed after !) of expression, matches expression only from start of message
$ if used at end of expression, matches expression only at end of message
! if used at beginning of expression, will negate the matching
| split the search, so 'A|B' translates to 'A OR B', and '!A|B' translates to 'NOT A AND NOT B'

Field.Heading: Unit Type
Field.Help: Search within a specific Unit Type

Field.Heading: Max rows
Field.Help: Limit the number of search result. Default is 100 entries.

Field.Heading: Unit
Field.Help:
Specify a specific unit-id or even a part of a unit-id. The syntax:
word matches messages which contain 'word'
* matches 0 or more characters
_ matches 1 character
^ if used at beginning (allowed after !) of expression, matches expression only from start of message
$ if used at end of expression, matches expression only at end of message
! if used at beginning of expression, will negate the matching
| split the search, so 'A|B' translates to 'A OR B', and '!A|B' translates to 'NOT A AND NOT B'
